replies.author: KarenX
replies.txt_content:
标题: 枪插件的问题怎么设置枪射出去的子弹？不是//The Item ID of the ammo that the gun uses
是发射出去的子弹，比如叫1的枪，射出去的子弹是雪球
叫2的枪射出去的子弹是鸡蛋。就是这
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=144884&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E6%259E%25AA%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D

[groupid=772]Easy插件开发小组[/groupid]

replies.author: 上白丶慧泽音
replies.txt_content:
KarenX 发表于 2015-2-8 10:05
貌似地址出问题了:http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=144884&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3D ...
//The type of bullet fired (SNOWBALL, EGG, ARROW)  子弹的样子
bulletType=SNOWBALL
是这个(SNOWBALL, EGG, ARROW) 分别是雪球.鸡蛋.箭
